messages.title: Why am I standing?
messages.content: I am standing as a candidate because I believe in the potential of South Suffolk. The current trajectory will not support our area's development. We need new ideas and bold actions to ensure prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Implement system of 'double taxation' to encourage reducing NHS and Care costs. Increase business rates on vacant properties.
Simplify tax to lower costs. Increase prepaid education insurance for children's education.
Abolish Income Tax and National Insurance Tax, replacing them with simplification to lower tax costs.
Scale down Trident, focus foreign policy on peace but maintain strong defense.
Reform employment rules, reduce bureaucracy and streamline processes to improve employment rates.

issues.defence: Scale down Trident, focus foreign policy on peace but maintain strong defense.
issues.education: Simplify tax to lower costs. Increase prepaid education insurance for children's education.
issues.labourEmployment: Reform employment rules, reduce bureaucracy and streamline processes to improve employment rates.

community.content: South Suffolk, a constituency with history and potential.
